name: json2csv
description: Convert JSON to CSV, and CSV to JSON.

json2csv.toCSV.checkSchemaDifferences.description: Should all documents have the same schema? Note: An error will be thrown if some documents have differing schemas when this is set to true.

json2csv.toCSV.expandArrayObjects.description: Should objects in array values be deep-converted to CSV?

json2csv.toCSV.prependHeader.description: Should the auto-generated header be prepended as the first line in the CSV?

json2csv.toCSV.sortHeader.description: Should the header keys be sorted in alphabetical order?

json2csv.toCSV.delimiter.wrap.description: Wrap values in the delimiter of choice (e.g. wrap values in quotes).

json2csv.toCSV.excelBOM.description: Should a unicode character be prepended to allow Excel to open a UTF-8 encoded file with non-ASCII characters present.

json2csv.toCSV.trimHeaderFields.description: Should the header fields be trimmed?

json2csv.toCSV.trimFieldValues.description: Should the field values be trimmed? (in development)

json2csv.toJSON.delimiter.wrap.description: Wrap values in the delimiter of choice (e.g. wrap values in quotes).

json2csv.toJSON.excelBOM.description: Should a unicode character be prepended to allow Excel to open a UTF-8 encoded file with non-ASCII characters present.

json2csv.toJSON.trimHeaderFields.description: Should the header fields be trimmed?

json2csv.toJSON.trimFieldValues.description: Should the field values be trimmed? (in development)
